com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config

Class ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config.ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory
  • Enclosing interface:
    ConfigurationLoader

    public static class ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory component, which enables to load configuration parameters.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory.ConfigurationFormat
      Indicates in what format a configuration is expressed.
      static class  ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory.ConfigurationLocation
      Indicates from where a configuration should be loaded.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory

        public ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context applicationContext)
        This method should be invoked before the ConfigurationFactory#setBean(ConfigurationType, String, Class) method be invoked, hence very early at the application start-up (typically during the method.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - the Android application context, usually retrieved from a ContextWrapper.getApplicationContext() or from ContextWrapper.getApplicationContext(), which will be used to load the configuration parameters from the assets Android installation package .apk, or from the internal storage
        See Also:
        #setBean(ConfigurationType, String, Class), initialize(Context)

      • getApplicationContext

        public static android.content.Context getApplicationContext()
        Returns:
        the application context which has been provided to the initialize(Context) method (returns if this method has not been invoked)
        See Also:
        initialize(Context)

      • getInstance

        public static ConfigurationLoader getInstance(ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory.ConfigurationLocation configurationLocation,
                              ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory.ConfigurationFormat configurationFormat,
                              java.lang.String value)

      • load

        public static <T> T load(ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory.ConfigurationLocation configurationLocation,
         ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory.ConfigurationFormat configurationFormat,
         java.lang.String value,
         java.lang.Class<T> theClass)
              throws ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException
        Loads a Java bean.

        The method implementation is responsible for creating the right ConfigurationLoader, and then invoke its ConfigurationLoader#load(Class) method.

        Parameters:
        configurationType - the kind of configuration which indicates where and how the bean will be fulfilled
        value - will be passed to the internally created ConfigurationLoader
        theClass - the fully-qualified-name of the class of the bean which should be created. This class should expose a public no-argument constructor
        Returns:
        a valid bean (cannot be null)
        Throws:
        ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException - if something went wrong during the method execution
        See Also:
        initialize(Context), #getInstance(ConfigurationType, String)
